item.title: Eclipse Vorto
item.description: Interaction among different stakeholders via Vorto What is Vorto? Vorto provides an Eclipse Toolset that allows Device Manufacturers to easily describe device functionality and characteristics as Information Models. These models are managed in a Vorto Repository. Platform Providers provide Code generators that convert these models into device - specific “stubs” that run on the device and send Information Model compliant messages to the platform-specific IoT Backend. In order to process these messages in the IoT backend, Vorto offers a set of convenient technical components, for example parsers and validators.
